refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads data from a P5 Glove controller.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Opens and at control-rate polls a P5 Glove controller.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: The opcode locates a P5 Glove attached to the computer by USB, and starts a listener thread to poll the device.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Every control cycle the glove is polled for its position, and finger and button states. These values are read by the p5gdata opcode.
